process.name: Encapsulate Digital Object and its Metadata
process.description: Atomic process that encapsulate a digital object and its metadata together in a package of a specific format

input_slots.name: Digital Material InputSlot
input_slots.description: Input slot corresponding to the digital object

input_slots.name: Metadata InputSlot
input_slots.description: Input slot corresponding to the metadata

input_slots.name: Package Format InputSlot
input_slots.description: Input slot corresponding to the package format used to encapsulate the digital object and its metadata

output_slots.name: Output Package
output_slots.description: Output slot corresponding to the package resulting of encapsulate a digital object and its metadata
